TopicTitle: BUG REPORT: Pitch controls randomly inverted on control surfaces for aircraft.

Articles.Content: I've recently had a problem with the pitch controls being inverted, which could be fixed by inverting the controls, but that would pose problems with wings designed to have authority over roll and pitch. This never occurs with any of the other axes, just pitch.

Upon further investigation it appears as though this happens more often with wings that cover the whole side of the craft, so likely the software thinks that the control surface should be controlled like one placed on the front of the craft.
